website_summaries.verdict: This 544-piece set features Lloyd's Mech Dragon as seen in the LEGO Ninjago movie. It's heavily articulated and ready for battle.
pros: Includes pieces to build Mech Dragon
Assembled dragon has minifigure cockpit, snapping jaws, posable body, wheel-activated spiked tail and leg-mounted stud shooters
Comes with 4 minifigures: Lloyd, Master Wu, Lord Garmadon and Charlie
Measures 5"H x 23"L x 4"W. For ages 8 to 14
cons: Some sets have arrived with pieces missing

customer_reviews.title: it looks really awesome and the build is great fun and the minifigure ...
customer_reviews.text: This set is really phenomenal with one flaw I was expecting, it's not very posable. The tail is free swinging, the middle body joint is restricted to stay in a straight position, and the neck/head each only have on axis of motion. That being said, it looks really awesome and the build is great fun and the minifigure selection is fantastic if you're a Ninjago Movie fan not looking to buy every set. At the end of the day, it's still a dragon, and that's pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Rose Shir

customer_reviews.title: Just Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: First of all it is a Dragon which was enough to get me excited! Plus it is green (my favorite color!) and it's a mech (robot warrior machine that is person operated) all of which make this set amazing! It's a pretty big set too, with a full functional tail, sensei Wu, the Green ninja Lloyd, his dad Lord Garmadon, plus one of his minions.
customer_reviews.author: Brett TTop Contributor: Architecture

customer_reviews.title: Best of all.
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of hours my grandson had it put together and after buying hundreds of sets, and seeing the results I think this one is my all time favorite. It moves and the head seems real. I wish he wouldn't have taken it home, cause I would have it out on Sunday night, WHILE watching the "GAME OF THRONES."
customer_reviews.author: CN1021

customer_reviews.title: One of the best LEGO sets of the year!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased at a discounted price as a warehouse deal with damaged box, but all the contents were included. I love everything about this set, the build is cool, it has a lot of sand green parts, and 3 out of the 4 mini figures are above average (the shark army dude is okay). I'm not all that interested in the robot ninja vehicles or the Ninjago movie but this has a great design for a dragon. Maybe my only complaint is that it has jet engines instead of wings.
customer_reviews.author: willhx

customer_reviews.title: If you love dragons...
customer_reviews.text: My son and I love Legos especially any type of dragon model. This Lego set does not disappoint. It took my 6 yr old son about two hours to build. Highly recommend for any Ninjago fan!
customer_reviews.author: NYMom

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 6 year old. Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: My kid is 6, so therefore supposed to be too young for this. Nah! We both put it together. It took a long time! But it fits solidly and is an amazing lego sculpture. It came with a few extra spare bits (not sure if intentional). The only bad part is the little discs it fires are FAST and hard to find. I might glue a little ribbon on them or they will soon be lost for good.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Jamerson

customer_reviews.title: My son absolutely loved this and felt accomplished once he put it together
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loved this and felt accomplished once he put it together! It's the only Lego toy we've had that has lasted through the first week!
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: And I'll admit I love it, too
customer_reviews.text: Son had been asking for this for months, and it was everything he dreamed of. And I'll admit I love it, too. Terrific design, especially the way the tail can be flicked about. Would have been cool if they'd found a way to make the middle flex up and down as well as side to side, but that's a nit pick. My Lego adept 8-year-old was able to build it without help.
customer_reviews.author: Seamomster

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Frustrating for my son because we were missing several pieces required to build this set. We went through his other sets and loose legos to try to find substitute pieces, but this is the first time we have encountered this many missing pieces and it was very disappointing. The set itself looks like it would be really amazing if we had all of the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: BrianDH

customer_reviews.title: LEGOs are FUN
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 7-8 year old grandson, and he (and his older sister) loved it. I have given him several LEGO sets, and it occupies him for hours. After a while, these parts get mixed in with all his other LEGO pieces, and he is then very busy designing his own creation. These take even more time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: This one is beautiful, even to me Grandma
customer_reviews.text: This one is beautiful, even to me Grandma. Had it shipped to my 12 year old grandson for Christmas. The package, marked as a gift, arrived in a timely fashion and without any damage. The dragon looks great and bigger than I expected, probably close to 2 ft long from nose to tail. It was very much enjoyed by my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 5 year old grandson. It was wonderful working with him to build this. He only needed a little help. Once assembled, he spent hours playing with the dragon - and was quite proud of himself. He really didn't want to do anything else until this was finished.
customer_reviews.author: S. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Grandson LOVED this gift!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got for my Grandson for Christmas. When he opened it he jumped up and shouted "look what I got". He ioves Lego and Ninjago so this was a favorite for him. I got a great price on this so I was elated that he loved it. I highly recommend this toy and have purchased many other Lego toys from this site and will get more for birthdays, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer827

customer_reviews.title: Engrossing and impressive
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this. At almost 7 he spent hours building it himself on Christmas Day. It's impressive when built, too, lots of details, and some good movement to the tail and head. At under $35 I thought it was a great deal for an impressive kit without spending too much on something that may end up deconstructed into just bricks.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bedford

customer_reviews.title: GO LLOYD!!
customer_reviews.text: Killer set from the Ninjago movie. LOTS of pieces (kids love that) but it's sturdy enough to actually play with. One of the few sets that has stayed in tact since we assembled it.
customer_reviews.author: Robb Zbierski

customer_reviews.title: Uhh what?!?!
customer_reviews.text: The kid liked it but the lore and backstory makes no sense at all. First its this particular model isnt a dragon. Its a drake. Second why are ninjas even interacting with dragons. Ninjas are stealth assassins... how stealth can you be on a flying 40 foot (to scale with the lego guy that cam3 with it) lizard that breaths fire. Also there is a wizard in the collection... which even confuses me more. Its almost lego mashed together two lores with no respect to either of them. Its almost as if they are pandering for over priced plastic connectors. But my kid loves it and doesnt seem to mind the contridictions at all... 😐
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Super impressive once built!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool LEGO set! So far, this is the most impressive built set by my son. He had a ton of fun building it and it’s so cool for him to play with. The tail moves back and forth, with many great details throughout the set.
customer_reviews.author: sdgal

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just to happy to express. put it together in under 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Invictus... William Ernest Henley ( 1849–1903)

customer_reviews.title: My son assembled this right after he opened all of ...
customer_reviews.text: My son assembled this right after he opened all of his Christmas gifts. He really enjoys playing with the dragon.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Banville

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great model
customer_reviews.text: From adult collector perspective: Great price for such a large kit. It's a very good sized dragon. One of the larger pieces I've ever built. Very intricate and interactive. Definitely want to try the other dragons after this one.

customer_reviews.title: Lego fun!

customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. My son discovered that it is missing the head after he spent 3 hours assembling it. Amazon gave a refund.

She liked her Lego set but her mother told me that she made it a little more feminine than it originally was.

The day he received it he was able to assemble it with some help from his dad and then he slept with it that night! He loves how big it is and the way the tail moves. A call from him confirmed a very happy little boy!

customer_reviews.title: really cool but took time!

I and my husband had to help my son who is 8 do this but this was our first large one.the directions where very good they walked you though it and explained everything. the pieces are just so small its hard to keep it all in one spot. I would not recommend doing this near any small kids or animals!

customer_reviews.title: LEGO dragon - Awesome, Being Shipped in the LEGO box - bad
customer_reviews.text: The LEGO dragon and characters are awesome and my 5 year old grandson is having a great time playing Ninjago. The box came damaged and of course it had the UPS labels stuck on it, so to be able to remove the shipping labels to wrap the gift from Santa, I ended up ripping a lot of the box’s cover off. I almost sent it back to the seller for this reason.

product_meta.title: LEGO NINJAGO Movie Green Ninja Mech Dragon 70612 Ninja Toy with Dragon Figurine Building Kit (544 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Kids can outwit The Green Ninja's evil father Garmadon with this mighty THE LEGO NINJAGO MOVIE mech. This green dragon features articulated snapping jaws, a fully posable body, wheel-activated swooshing tail, 2 leg-mounted stud shooters and 2 hidden pop-out thrusters. The model mech kit also includes 4 minifigures with assorted action toys, including The Green Ninja's sword and Garmadon's laser-style pointer - to offer even more role-play possibilities with these battle toys.
feature_bullets: Kids can build their own mech with this Green Dragon in this action-packed Ninjago set. This dragon toy features a minifigure cockpit, articulated snapping jaws, posable body, wheel-activated swooshing tail with spikes, and two leg-mounted stud shooters!
This mech model kit includes 4 minifigures, Ninjago Lloyd, Master Wu, Lord Garmadon and Charlie. Kids will spend hours role playing with their favorite Ninjago figures.
This LEGO NINJAGO brick building kit is also compatible with all other LEGO construction sets for endless pretend play
Featured in THE LEGO NINJAGO MOVIE, this Ninjago mech lets kids play with their favorite Ninjago figures and recreate some of their favorite moments alongside this dragon toy
The Green Ninja Mech Dragon in this dragon playset measures over 5-inch high, 23-inch long and 4-inch wide with 544 pieces. For boys and girls between the ages of 8 and 14 years old
